dvmcps.content: {"name":"Job Requests DVM","picture":"https://image.nostr.build/f3461d73387b1ae9f32349821bb00d1b6f02d36f4495c0f837871cc88b1a19a1.jpg","about":"I will do work for you.","supportsEncryption":false,"acceptsNutZaps":false,"nip90Params":{},"tools":[{"name":"job-request","description":"What work you need done.","inputSchema":{"$schema":"http://json-schema.org/draft-07/schema#","title":"ServiceRequest","description":"A request for a service or action of any kind.","type":"object","required":["request_id","created_at","summary"],"properties":{"request_id":{"type":"string","description":"A unique identifier for the request (e.g., a UUID)."},"created_at":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Timestamp indicating when the request was created, in ISO 8601 format."},"requester":{"type":"object","description":"Information about the person making the request.","properties":{"name":{"type":"string","description":"Name or username of the requester."},"contact":{"description":"Contact details (email, phone, or other). Could be a string or nested object.","oneOf":[{"type":"string"},{"type":"object"}]},"metadata":{"type":"object","description":"Arbitrary key-value pairs for extra requester information.","additionalProperties":true}},"required":[]},"summary":{"type":"string","description":"Short human-friendly summary or title of the request.","minLength":1},"details":{"type":"string","description":"Longer description of exactly what is needed. Optional if the summary is sufficient."},"constraints":{"type":"object","description":"Constraints such as time, budget, location, or other limiting factors.","properties":{"time":{"type":"object","properties":{"desired_completion":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"ISO 8601 date/time by which the request should be completed. Can be interpreted as a single point or a range if needed."},"flexible":{"type":"boolean","description":"Indicates whether the completion date/time is flexible."}},"required":[]},"budget":{"type":"object","properties":{"amount":{"type":"number","description":"Maximum budget or cost constraint."},"currency":{"type":"string","description":"Currency code (e.g., 'USD', 'EUR')."}},"required":[]},"location":{"type":"object","description":"Location constraints or delivery address.","properties":{"address":{"type":"string","description":"Street address or freeform location string."},"coordinates":{"type":"object","properties":{"lat":{"type":"number","description":"Latitude in decimal degrees."},"lon":{"type":"number","description":"Longitude in decimal degrees."}},"required":[]}},"required":[]}},"required":[]},"priority":{"type":"string","description":"Indicates request urgency. Suggested values: 'low', 'medium', 'high'.","enum":["low","medium","high"],"default":"medium"},"metadata":{"type":"object","description":"Arbitrary key-value pairs for additional info not covered by other fields.","additionalProperties":true}},"additionalProperties":false}}]}
